actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands and Reserved Water. Hearings held at La Grande, Oregon.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in and near the Hells Canyon National Recreation Area as additions to the Hells Canyon Wilderness, Oregon, and for other purposes.
short_title: Hells Canyon National Recreation Area Conservation Act of 1985

summary.text: Hells Canyon National Recreation Area Conservation Act of 1985-Designates specified lands in and near the Hells Canyon National Recreation Area as additions to the Hells Canyon Wilderness, Oregon. Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a section of the Snake River, Oregon, Washington, and Idaho, as a scenic river.

titles.title: Hells Canyon National Recreation Area Conservation Act of 1985
A bill to designate certain lands in and near the Hells Canyon National Recreation Area as additions to the Hells Canyon Wilderness, Oregon, and for other purposes.
